reviewText: An awesome collection of some of Brad's best songs. Mostly of his older songs that made him so popular. A must have for any fan.
all of my favorite songs on one disc, who could ask for anything more, brad at his best! love it!
I ordered this video compilation for my husband for a Christmas stocking stuffer. We are both big fans of Brad and were excited to watch the videos.
This is a great DVD, enjoy the film clips and the music (of course).  Recommend it to anyone who just wants to sit back and relax and have a laugh.
